This list should contain a series of topics related to modern data
science working environment with R. You can expect posts about:

-    running R and Rstudio in a remote and portable setup.

-    Setting up binder for running the scripts in your github repository

-   Use github actions to update rocker images containing rstudio server
    and all the packages and dependencies that the code in your
    repository needs to run.

-   Working in remote with rstudio.

-    Quarto notebooks
